tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    value DECIMAL(10,2),
    date_recorded TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE kpi_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE dashboard_widgets (
    widget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    widget_name STRING,
    widget_type STRING,
    widget_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE user_dashboards (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name STRING,
    dashboard_name STRING
)

CREATE TABLE dashboard_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dashboard_id INT,
    log_message STRING,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE dashboard_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    kpi_name VARCHAR,
    kpi_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
